channel.title: Adding a mining spot?
channel.description:
ok guys so I wanted to add a new mining spot into my game, im not completely sure how i would go about it, basically all i know is i would have to get my model... anyone think they can link me to a tut or let me know where to start?
thanks.

item.title: Adding a mining spot?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Moved to server help.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a mining spot?
item.dc:creator: @syracusepker94 syracusepker94
item.description:
@syracusepker94 wrote:

[quote=“kronics, post:1, topic:314461”]ok guys so I wanted to add a new mining spot into my game, im not completely sure how i would go about it, basically all i know is i would have to get my model… anyone think they can link me to a tut or let me know where to start?

thanks.[/quote]
this has nothing to do with clients or models

you are most likely using a deltascource so open up your client.java (server side)
search

makeglobalobject

c/p a row of that and just add the object and coords to it

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a mining spot?
item.dc:creator: @PDPK PDPK
item.description:
@PDPK wrote:

The mining rocks are coded into the server. you will need to find the ID of the rocks and change the coords of them. you can find the Objects ID’s moparscape objects list

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a mining spot?
item.dc:creator: @ShadowDD ShadowDD
item.description:
@ShadowDD wrote:

Well you don’t know what your talking about from looks of me… Anyways its adding objects in the server files… Try looking up object adding on http://www.youtube.com server sided

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a mining spot?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

You talk about a new mining spot then you go on about models?
What do you want, a whole new type of ore/rock?

And, moved to client help for now, what you want is probably server side though.

Read full topic
